item.title: CVE-2024-34818|2024-08-02T02:59:22.658Z -- webinarpress -- webinarpress
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in WebinarPress.This issue affects WebinarPress: from n/a through 1.33.17.

item.title: CVE-2024-31256|2024-06-04T17:36:39.114Z -- webinarpress -- webinarpress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WebinarPress allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects WebinarPress: from n/a through 1.33.9.
